alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 4:13AM PST until February 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the North Cascades and 4 to 6 inches in the Central Cascades. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area and the Cascade mountains of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
